001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004
005/**
006 * An ActivationFunction maps a logit to an output.
007 */
008@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
009public interface ActivationFunction {
010
011    /**
012     * Name of the activation function.
013     *
014     * @return the name
015     */
016    default String name() {
017        return getClass().getSimpleName();
018    }
019
020    /**
021     * Maps the logit to the corresponding output.
022     *
023     * @param logit the logit to map
024     * @return the corresponding output value
025     */
026    float activate(float logit);
027
028    /**
029     * Determine the slope (gradient) at the given output value
030     *
031     * @param output the output at which the gradient is determined
032     * @return the gradient
033     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException when the gradient is not supported by this function
034     */
035    default float determineGradientForOutput(float output) {
036        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
037    }
038
039}
